comments:
During publishing a temporary jar is created for the dependant modules. After creation this jar is renamed (moved) to the location in the WebApps directory.
Moving fails for an unknown reason (source file exists, destination direcory does not (fully) exist.

The file  C:\data\O2V3WorkspaceWST1.0RC1\.metadata\.plugins\org.eclipse.jst.server.core\tmp26720jar does exist at the time of the error

The directory C:\data\O2V3WorkspaceWST1.0RC1\.metadata\.plugins\org.eclipse.wst.server.core\tmp0\webapps
does exist at the time of the error; this means the suffix \MijnOhraWEB\WEB-INF\lib does NOT.

Suggestion: pre-create the destionation directory before trying to move the file.

Stack trace:

Error 2005-12-07 09:36:20.639 Error creating zip file OxygenLIB.jar: Error renaming C:\data\O2V3WorkspaceWST1.0RC1\.metadata\.plugins\org.eclipse.jst.server.core\tmp35148jar to C:\data\O2V3WorkspaceWST1.0RC1\.metadata\.plugins\org.eclipse.wst.server.core\tmp0\webapps\MijnOhraWEB\WEB-INF\lib\OxygenLIB.jar
java.lang.Exception: Error renaming C:\data\O2V3WorkspaceWST1.0RC1\.metadata\.plugins\org.eclipse.jst.server.core\tmp35148jar to C:\data\O2V3WorkspaceWST1.0RC1\.metadata\.plugins\org.eclipse.wst.server.core\tmp0\webapps\MijnOhraWEB\WEB-INF\lib\OxygenLIB.jar
at org.eclipse.jst.server.core.PublishUtil.createZipFile(PublishUtil.java:377)
at org.eclipse.jst.server.tomcat.core.internal.PublishOperation2.publishJar(PublishOperation2.java:93)
at org.eclipse.jst.server.tomcat.core.internal.PublishOperation2.execute(PublishOperation2.java:51)
at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.model.ServerBehaviourDelegate.performTasks(ServerBehaviourDelegate.java:789)
at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.model.ServerBehaviourDelegate.publish(ServerBehaviourDelegate.java:576)
at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.internal.Server.doPublish(Server.java:740)
at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.internal.Server.publish(Server.java:729)
at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.internal.PublishServerJob.run(PublishServerJob.java:145)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:76)
The problem seems to be related to a project that was created with an earlier version of WST. A similar Dynamic Web project created with WST 1.0RC1 does publish OK
This bug would be hit whenever the host Web project does not have a WEB-INF/lib directory in it. Patch dropped to HEAD and will be released for RC2 later today.

(In reply to comment #2)
> This bug would be hit whenever the host Web project does not have a WEB-INF/lib
> directory in it. Patch dropped to HEAD and will be released for RC2 later
> today.
> 

In this particular case there IS a lib directory (with several jars in it)
My guess is that it is some incompatability between 0.7 and 1.0RC1 concerning one of the .<project> files.
Closing bug since the fix is available in RC2. If you do find a migration case from 0.7 that is still broken, please feel free to reopen and attach an example project or steps to reproduce.
This change is a bulk update of all _un_targeted, fixed, resolved bugs upon release of M5. This particular bug _might_ have been fixed earlier than M5. (Feel free to correct).
